result.title: Distribution and storage systems detailed models
result.description: This the document gives details on the detailed models that will be developted for distribution and storage systems. For each model it will be described: • Its architecture and different components, • The method used to develop its relative behavioural models, including: Description of models inputs, outputs and parameters that can be used for design purpose and modelling assumptions and their impacts.

result.title: Demand side detailed models
result.description: This the document gives details on the detailed models that will be developted for demand side. For each model it will be described: • Its architecture and different components, • The method used to develop its relative behavioural models, including: Description of models inputs, outputs and parameters that can be used for design purpose and modelling assumptions and their impacts.
